transcript.speaker: user
transcript.text: I am facing some issues with my billing. Can you help me with it?

transcript.speaker: agent
transcript.text:
I’m sorry you’re having trouble with your billing.  
To resolve this quickly, please visit our Billing Support page at https://example.com/billing-support and submit a request—our team will review your account and get back to you within 24 hours.

clean_text: i am facing some issues with my billing. can you help me with it?
script:
I’m sorry you’re having trouble with your billing.  
To resolve this quickly, please visit our Billing Support page at https://example.com/billing-support and submit a request—our team will review your account and get back to you within 24 hours.
